name: SO-COL
description: SO-COL is a community management platform that helps creators and brands engage with their audience through NFT gated communities. Our platform is for all community leaders, including influencers, musicians, artists, instructors and interest groups. SO-COL also provides white label services for brands who want to provide NFTs and new offerings to their customers. SO-COL works with partners in consumer tech, F&B, entertainment and more.
